title: UK survey : when most consumers will start their Christmas shopping in the UK in 2013
summary: This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey regarding patriotism in the consumers .
The respondents were asked how proud they are to be an UK .
In 2013 , some 31 % of survey respondents stated they were November proud to be an UK .
gold: When are consumers more likely to their Christmas shopping in the UK , September 2013.
The majority of the consumers in the UK plan to do their Christmas shopping in November.
One in four had already bought presents while 2 percent of the consumers planed to go shopping in December or the week before Christmas .
